title: RethingIt
description: A community-driven web app that makes it easy to lend and borrow everyday items locally, reducing waste and promoting sustainable sharing.
features: Built with Firebase Auth, Firestore, Realtime DB

title: Rename Global Warming
description: A public awareness project inviting users to suggest new names for climate change and share visual evidence of its impact.

title: Citadel
description: A bilingual landing page for a Ukrainian MilTech startup featuring a bold USP, 3D product demo, and lead capture form.

title: Gradus AI
description: An ambitious AI-powered content marketing automation platform designed for the alcohol industry (beverages/spirits B2B). The system features a 4-stage roadmap that progressively automates the entire marketing-to-sales funnel using AI avatars, content generation, and autonomous agent workflows.

title: Blackjack
description: A classic card game of Blackjack. Try your hand, but remember: the casino always wins. Just kidding, you can win too!

title: Dev's Wordle
description: A mobile Wordle-style game with a twist of programmer humor. Each wrong letter eliminates a programming language.

title: Dice
description: A fun little game that you can play with your kids or on your coffee break. Just roll the dice until all 10 of them show the same number. Click on dice to "hold" them.
features: Journey mapping and pain point analysis

title: See The Weather
description: This beautiful app integrates multiple APIs to fetch real-time weather data and showcase stock photos matched by location and weather variables.

title: Meme Generator
description: Built mobile-first, this simple yet fun app pulls random images from a meme API, stores them in an array, and lets you generate new memes at the click of a button.

title: Password Generator
description: An app that generates strong, random passwords keeping hackers out of business. Whether you need a quick solution or want to make your old password strong again.

title: Score Tracker
description: A simple app to track your scores in various games. Keep a record of your best performances and share them with friends.

title: Text Summarizer
description: A powerful tool that uses AI to summarize long texts into concise, easy-to-read summaries.

title: Kos Chef
description: An AI-powered recipe generator that creates unique recipes based on your ingredients.

title: Image Describer
description: Equipped with accessibility features, The Describer helps people with impaired sight by providing AI-powered voice and text descriptions of images.
